00036 class DL_CreationInterface {
00037 public:
00038     DL_CreationInterface() {}
00039 
00041     virtual void addPoint(double point[]) = 0;
00042 
00044     virtual void addLine(double point1[], double point2[]) = 0;
00045 
00047         virtual void addArc(double center[], 
00048                         double radius, 
00049                         double angle1, double angle2, 
00050                         bool reversed) = 0;
00051         
00053         virtual void addCircle(double center[], 
00054                            double radius) = 0;
00055 
00057         virtual void addPolyline() = 0;
00058 
00060         virtual void addVertex(double point[], double bulge) = 0;
00061 };
